ygData.subject: Re: Assassin and Llama

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Burning Hammer: As long as I get paid or have my fun, I listen to authority.
Zardus' payment to me is letting me stay on the winning side, to be a world
ruler once he rules the universe, which is bound to happen with me on his
side! Seeing as how you are on the same side as me, I have no reason to be
telling you that I would kill you, for unless Zardus wants me to, I would
never even pinch you, no matter how fun it may be. I've had hundreds of
kills, and I have learned that when you don't listen to authority, then you
become a wanted assassin, more wanted than you already are, so I like to
stay in good with the bosses, if you get what I'm saying...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 24, 2000 12:12 PM
Subject: Assassin and Llama


> ::Lambda::
>     "So you're all business?  You'd just as soon kill me as escort me to
your
> base?  I find that hard to believe.  Is everyone there like you.  Cold,
> unfeeling.  They do only what their leader says and not a thing more."
>
>
>
>
